author: Duplicate ttjm1997
post_text: December 16, 2017 at 3:52 PM#1Hey All,I'm working on a project where and the client asked for a way, that he can type a fixture number and a dmx channel, and automatically there are five channel /intensity, Red, Green, Blue, White/.This is one sub project in the showfile, so it can be that the dmx channel input is already in use, what i want is to have a pop up that says it's going on other dmx channels. Everything is going to executors and controlled with dmx remotes.i already have written a couple of macro's but can't seem to get it working,i have attached all the macro's that make the master macro working, is there someone who can help me with this one?already a big thank you!TimFilesRGB Fader _NOT WORKING_.xml21.94 kB – 96 Downloads
